sentences.en: After that, everybody pelted snowballs at anybody who was riding the sled.
sentences.cn: 那之后, 每个人都对著坐雪橇滑下来的人砸雪球.

sentences.en: All the day in the sled team follow the lead dog.
sentences.cn: 雪橇队所有的狗都跟随领队狗.

sentences.en: And Rosebud was just a sled.
sentences.cn: 而那个玫瑰花蕾也只是个雪橇.

sentences.en: Breed of hunting and sled dog found near the Arctic Circle.
sentences.cn: 产于北极圈附近的猎犬和雪橇犬.

sentences.en: He pulled the lightened sled with all his strength.
sentences.cn: 他用尽全力拉减轻了重量的雪橇。

sentences.en: He said he would join me sled - length in declining to yield.
sentences.cn: 他说他将兴我全力合作拒绝让步.

sentences.en: Idea 2 : Kathleen falls off the sled when it hits a bump.
sentences.cn: 想法 二: 雪橇撞到地面突起物时,凯萨琳掉下来了.

sentences.en: Jack dug his sled out of the cellar.
sentences.cn: 杰克从地窖中翻找出雪橇.

sentences.en: She dropped the sled to the snow and jumped on. The broken steel runner spread apart.
sentences.cn: 她把雪橇放在雪上,然后跳到上面去,原先断裂的滑行钢片一下就分开了.

sentences.en: Shuttle attaches magnetically to the warp sled with neodymium magnets ( included ).
sentences.cn: 穿梭重视磁性钕磁铁与 ( 雪橇经纱含税 ).

sentences.en: The hut stands at the foot of a near vertical wall of rock in an icy fjord in the high Arctic, a week away by dog sled from the nearest human settlement.
sentences.cn: 小屋坐落在高纬度北极地区峡湾边一座几乎是垂直的山岩下，从最近的有人居住的地方到此地，狗拉的雪橇要走一个星期。

sentences.en: The man attached a strong rope to his sled.
sentences.cn: 那人将一条结实的绳子系在他的雪撬上.

sentences.en: The sled gathered speed as it moved down the hill.
sentences.cn: 雪橇向山下滑动时速度变得越来越快.

sentences.en: The sled struck the tree head - on .
sentences.cn: 雪橇 迎头 撞上那棵树.

sentences.en: We got home and went sledding on the small hill in our back garden.
sentences.cn: 我们回到家，去后院的小山丘上滑雪橇。

sentences.en: When does he get off the sled and help Kathleen?
sentences.cn: 他何时离开雪橇来帮凯萨琳?

sentences.en: When his sled broke down, he repaired it.
sentences.cn: 当他的雪橇坏掉时，他自己维修。

sentences.en: You can coast downhill on a sled or a bicycle.
sentences.cn: 你可以乘雪撬或骑自行车向山脚下滑行.

用雪橇搬运；乘雪橇；用大锤打

trans.tran_en: A sled is the same as a
A sled is the same as a
If you sled or go sledding, you ride on a sled
